items.content: Sangat baik dalam koordinasi sebagai team member, memiliki semangat tinggi untuk berkembang.
items.author: I Gede Ngurah Yudi Saputra

items.content: Veda is exceptionally ambitious, with an insatiable desire to master everything in the field of computer science. Heâ€™s not only eager to learn and grow but also excels as both a team leader and a team player. It was a pleasure working with him, and I would welcome the opportunity to collaborate with him again.
items.author: Muhammad Dylan Hikma Sanjaya
